20101204015540.667|20101204015541.333|CCO|
20101204015541.333|20101204015542.000|CCO|      heart medicines do alone,
20101204015542.000|20101204015542.769|CCO|  to provide greater protection
20101204015542.769|20101204015543.538|CCO|    
20101204015543.538|20101204015544.308|CCO|        against heart attack
20101204015544.308|20101204015545.077|CCO|    
20101204015545.077|20101204015545.846|CCO|    or stroke and even death
20101204015545.846|20101204015546.615|CCO|        
20101204015546.615|20101204015547.385|CCO|              by helping
20101204015547.385|20101204015548.154|CCO|    
20101204015548.154|20101204015548.923|CCO|    to keep blood platelets
20101204015548.923|20101204015549.692|CCO|    
20101204015549.692|20101204015550.462|CCO|      from sticking together
20101204015550.462|20101204015551.231|CCO|
20101204015551.231|20101204015552.000|CCO|    and forming dangerous clots.
20101204015552.000|20101204015552.588|CCO|        
20101204015552.588|20101204015553.176|CCO|        Ask your doctor
20101204015553.176|20101204015553.765|CCO|
20101204015553.765|20101204015554.353|CCO|    if PLAVIX is right for you.
20101204015554.353|20101204015554.941|CCO|    
20101204015554.941|20101204015555.529|CCO|      Protection that helps
20101204015555.529|20101204015556.118|CCO|        
20101204015556.118|20101204015556.706|CCO|            save lives.
20101204015556.706|20101204015557.294|CCO|    
20101204015557.294|20101204015557.882|CCO|        [ Female Announcer ]
20101204015557.882|20101204015558.471|CCO|    
20101204015558.471|20101204015559.059|CCO|    Certain genetic factors
20101204015559.059|20101204015559.647|CCO|    
20101204015559.647|20101204015600.235|CCO|        and some medicines,
20101204015600.235|20101204015600.824|CCO|    
20101204015600.824|20101204015601.412|CCO|          such as Prilosec,
20101204015601.412|20101204015602.000|CCO|    reduce the effect of PLAVIX
20101204015602.000|20101204015602.625|CCO|    leaving you at greater risk
20101204015602.625|20101204015603.250|CCO|
20101204015603.250|20101204015603.875|CCO|    for heart attack and stroke.
20101204015603.875|20101204015604.500|CCO|    
20101204015604.500|20101204015605.125|CCO|        Your doctor may use
20101204015605.125|20101204015605.750|CCO|

20101204015606.375|20101204015607.000|CCO|

20101204015607.625|20101204015608.250|CCO|    
20101204015608.250|20101204015608.875|CCO|    Don't stop taking PLAVIX
20101204015608.875|20101204015609.500|CCO|
20101204015609.500|20101204015610.125|CCO|  without talking to your doctor
20101204015610.125|20101204015610.750|CCO|    as your risk of heart attack
20101204015610.750|20101204015611.375|CCO|    
20101204015611.375|20101204015612.000|CCO|    or stroke may increase.
20101204015612.000|20101204015612.588|CCO|  People with stomach ulcers or
20101204015612.588|20101204015613.176|CCO|
20101204015613.176|20101204015613.765|CCO|  conditions that cause bleeding
20101204015613.765|20101204015614.353|CCO|    
20101204015614.353|20101204015614.941|CCO|      should not use PLAVIX.
20101204015614.941|20101204015615.529|CCO|    
20101204015615.529|20101204015616.118|CCO|        Taking PLAVIX alone
20101204015616.118|20101204015616.706|CCO|
20101204015616.706|20101204015617.294|CCO|  or with some other medicines,
20101204015617.294|20101204015617.882|CCO|    
20101204015617.882|20101204015618.471|CCO|          including aspirin,
20101204015618.471|20101204015619.059|CCO|
20101204015619.059|20101204015619.647|CCO|    may increase bleeding risk,
20101204015619.647|20101204015620.235|CCO|

20101204015620.824|20101204015621.412|CCO|

20101204015622.000|20101204015622.833|CCO|        
20101204015622.833|20101204015623.667|CCO|        Tell your doctor
20101204015623.667|20101204015624.500|CCO|    
20101204015624.500|20101204015625.333|CCO|    all medicines you take,
20101204015625.333|20101204015626.167|CCO|  including aspirin, especially
20101204015626.167|20101204015627.000|CCO|

20101204015627.833|20101204015628.667|CCO|  If fever, unexplained weakness
